pipeline.name: Cookie Orders Pipeline
pipeline.description: Pipeline for tracking cookie orders from submission to delivery

stages.name: New Order
stages.description: Order has been submitted and is awaiting processing
actions: Send order confirmation email to customer

stages.name: Processing
stages.description: Order is being reviewed and prepared for baking

stages.name: Ready for Delivery
stages.description: Cookies are baked and ready for pickup/delivery

stages.name: Delivered
stages.description: Order has been delivered to customer

stages.name: Completed
stages.description: Order is complete and customer is satisfied
actions: Add to customer database for future orders

setup_instructions: 1. Create a new pipeline in GHL called 'Cookie Orders Pipeline'
2. Add the 6 stages listed above in the correct order
3. Set the colors and descriptions as specified
4. Configure the pipeline to automatically create opportunities from form submissions
5. Set up the automated workflows for each stage transition
